title: Fixed "Pixel Launcher keeps stopping" by uninstalling update. Am I missing anything?
content:
I installed the update that was waiting for me this morning but then kept getting the "Pixel Launcher keeps stopping" popup. I eventually found that I could solve the problem by selecting App Info then uninstalling the Launcher update.

Now my question is: was there any intended performance improvement or new functionality that I have now lost by uninstalling the update?

By the way, my wife's identical phone did not have this problem after the update.
